forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, this morning unfolds under a sunlit canvas, the golden rays painting the cityscape with promise. The air is pleasantly crisp, beckoning all to step outdoors and savor the serenity. With temperatures climbing towards a gentle high near 70, it seems nature is encouraging a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet coffee on an outdoor patio. While the forecast predicts a slight drop to around 65 by afternoon, this will only enhance the allure of the day, offering a gentle reminder of the cool marine influence that defines the Bay Area.

The marine layer remains at bay for now, with the distant hills providing a picturesque backdrop, lending a sense of clarity to the horizon. Shadows dance playfully across the landscape, and the muted chatter of the city hums in harmony with the soft breeze. The occasional gust from the southwest whispers through the streets, charmingly tousling hair and fluttering the pages of open books in the hands of passersby. Dressing in layers is wise; a light jacket will serve well against the evening chill that will settle as the sun dips, creating a perfect opportunity to cozy up with a friend amidst the twinkling lights of the city come twilight. As day transitions to night, consider meandering through the lively streets, enjoying the rhythm of locals, or perhaps visiting a favorite bookstore to lose oneself in the pages of a good novel, indulging in small pleasures as the day comes to its soothing close.
